def scratch(lottery):
    return sum(int(n) for lot in lottery for a,b,c,n in [lot.split()] if a==b==c)

def scratch(lottery):
    return sum(int(i.split()[-1]) for i in lottery if len(set(i.split()))==2)
scratch=lambda l:sum(int(a[3])for a in(r.split()for r in l)if len({*a})<3)

def scratch(lottery):
    return sum(int(s.split()[-1]) for s in lottery if len(set(s.split()[:-1])) == 1)

def scratch(L):
    return sum(int(d)*(a==b==c) for x in L for a,b,c,d in [x.split()])

def scratch(lottery):
    return sum([int(i.split()[-1]) for i in lottery if len(set(i.split()[:-1]))==1])

def scratch(lottery): ##
    return sum(int(n) for combi in lottery for a,b,c,n in [combi.split()]if a==b==c)

def scratch(lottery):
    return sum(int(combi.split()[-1]) for combi in lottery if combi.split()[0]==combi.split()[1]==combi.split()[2]) or 0

def scratch(lottery):
    return sum(int(i.split()[3]) for i in lottery if i.split()[0] == i.split()[1] == i.split()[2])
